Welcome to Translate Now 2.0
Thanks to your feedbacks, we have developed new features exclusively for you:
- Super Camera Translator: Now you can translate any image or printed text
- Easy Conversation Mode: Hold a conversation in any language
- Brand new design: Translate everything with ease
Please let us know if you enjoy it leaving us a review or sending an email to: support@wzp.solutions

Thank you for using Translate Now! We’ve made some great improvements for this release, including:
- Faster translation. Now you can get your translations 3 times faster (we've checked).
- Disturbing microphone bug fixed? Yeahhhh!!!
- Awesome camera improvement
Please let us know if you enjoy it, leaving us a review or sending an email to: support@wzp.solutions

To get your translations even faster, we’ve added support for Siri Shortcuts in iOS 12.

Now you can create custom voice commands for the following functions:
Translation History - Access your saved translations
Camera Translation - Translate a picture using your camera
Conversation Mode - Start a foreign language conversation
Text Translation - Access your text translation view

Please leave your review on the AppStore or send your feedback to support@wzp.solutions

To get your translations even faster, we’ve added support for Siri Shortcuts in iOS 12.

Now you can create custom voice commands for the following functions:
Translation History - Access your saved translations
Camera Translation - Translate a picture using your camera
Conversation Mode - Start a foreign language conversation
Text Translation - Access your text translation view

Please leave your review on the AppStore or send your feedback to support@wzp.solutions

借助新的小组件和3D Touch，您的翻译现在变得更加轻松和快捷。

使用小组件快速翻译：
• 以前所未有的速度翻译剪贴板
• 无需打开应用程序即可翻译文本

3D Touch：
• 只需轻按一下，即可使用3D Touch访问应用程序的特定功能

如需任何帮助，请联系：
support@wzp.solutions

Dear friends, we’re very excited to announce that from today on you can use your lovely Translate Now app on Apple Watch.

Enjoy translating on the go!

PS: Please do not forget to leave us your comments about the new feature.

- Your Translate Now team

Dear users,
Now you can translate without internet !!!!
Our new offline mode allows you to translate abroad without having to pay expensive roaming charges.

Try it out

Please leave your review on the AppStore or send your feedback to support@airapps.co

Your Translate Now team

Prepared for the future?
iOS 13 is here and we are full of new features!
To celebrate, we polished our design to bring you a new beautiful interface!

Let’s see what’s new:

• Dark Mode
Protect your eyes from bright light and save your battery life.

• Phrasebook
Create custom lists of phrases for each language to access them whenever you need, even offline.

• New Design
Get the app with a brand new design. Check it out!

Happy translating!

Better than you thought, faster than ever. Try it now!

Dear Friend,

Thank you for entering my life.
For the last year, I have been through so many different stages, like many bugs fixing, new features, different colors, new languages, and through all of the good and bad times, you have been with me.
I couldn’t thank you enough for that.

So I only wanted to say once again, thanks for staying with me.

Your lovely Translate Now app!

PS: Love the app? Rate me! Your feedback means a lot to me.

Imagine if you look around in a foreign country and everything you see is in your mother language. Now your dream is about to become reality, we are glad to introduce Translate Now with AR.

Our pioneer AR translation feature brings you the power of translating anything around you into your desired language. No matter if you're learning a new language or traveling around the world, you are going to love it!

Try it out now!

As usual, we would like to remind you that we love to hear your feedback. Please let us know your feedback about this new feature.

- Your Translate Now team

Now optimized for iOS 14!

For the iOS 14 release, we implemented amazing features that help you get the most out of your device.

Let’s see what’s new:

• Favorite Translations Widget
See your favorite translations at a glance.

• News
Get international news in your language.

• News Widget
Keep updated with translated news at your fingertips.

• Scribble
Now you can write by hand to translate with the Apple Pencil.

• Brand new design
We polished our design to bring you a new beautiful interface.

Happy translating!

Dear friends, in this release we are bringing to you a brand new and optimized experience on Apple Watch. 
This feature was developed during the Apple Women Entrepreneur Camp, and aims to bring you an awesome experience while translating conversation on the go using your Apple Watch.
Please leave us you feedback. 
Need help? -> support@airapps.com
